Keymapp (unofficial) ZSA keyboard management tool
Flash and control your ZSA keyboard.
Keymapp allows you to view your keyboard's layout right on your screen, in real-time. When you switch a layer, Keymapp's display updates to show the keys active on this layer.
Please note that this is an unofficial effort by a third party to repackage the vendor's software for distribution via flatpak to offer more installation options, especially for those running immutable distros like Fedora Silverblue.
